title: Single View of Customer - Recommendations Engine

outcomes: Completed development of base template feature Kafka and Kotlin Springboot including integration, architecture and unit tests
Completed AWS infrastructure terraform for starter template
Developed all microservices in hexagonal architecture
responsibilities: Created five new microservices in Kotlin Springboot for Greenfields project (recommendations engine)
Created Kafka pipeline to handle event streaming
Developed AWS infrastructure using terraform for starter template that since serviced five new microservices
Implemented docker containers to improve test coverage
content.description: The SVoC recommendations engine was a Greenfields projects designed at providing accurate customer recommendations without the use of Personally Identifiable Information.
